<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advantageous Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=379) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 147 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

When an enemy's movement is compromised, you deliver a more deadly blow. Make a Strike against a creature that is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31), or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33). You gain a circumstance bonus to damage on this Strike equal to the number of weapon damage dice, or that number + 2 if you're wielding the weapon in two hands. The Strike gains the following failure effect. 

**Failure** You deal damage to the target equal to the number of weapon damage dice, or that number + 2 if you're wielding the weapon in two hands. This damage has the same damage type as the weapon.
name: Advantageous Assault
